history.proof: intros t. inversion 1. subst. left. reflexivity. right. exists (node t1 t2 :: l1), l2. split. split; auto. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} empty : A cover_inv_leaf_aux : forall (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> forall a : A, t = leaf a -> l = leaf a :: nil Unable to unify "forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> ?M1518 (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> ?M1518 l1 t3" with "btree A".

exceptions.tactic: intros l1 l2 t1 t2 t3 Hperm Hcover IH.

chat.content:
A: Type
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
empty: A
cover_inv_leaf_aux: forall (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> forall a : A, t = leaf a -> l = leaf a :: nil
============================
forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l (node t1 t2) -> l = node t1 t2 :: nil \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))

cover_not_nil : forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), cover l t -> l <> nil
one_cover_ex : forall l : list (btree A), l <> nil -> exists t : btree A, cover l t

app_inv_app2 : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A) (a b : A), l1 ++ l2 = l3 ++ a :: b :: l4 -> (exists l5 : list A, l1 = l3 ++ a :: b :: l5) \/ (exists l5 : list A, l2 = l5 ++ a :: b :: l4) \/ l1 = l3 ++ a :: nil /\ l2 = b :: l4
inb_antisym : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A), inb t1 t2 -> inb t2 t1 -> t1 = t2
app_inv_app : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A) (a : A), l1 ++ l2 = l3 ++ a :: l4 -> (exists l5 : list A, l1 = l3 ++ a :: l5) \/ (exists l5 : list A, l2 = l5 ++ a :: l4)

exist_first_max : forall l : list nat, l <> nil -> exists (a : nat) (l1 l2 : list nat), l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ (forall n1 : nat, In n1 l1 -> n1 < a) /\ (forall n1 : nat, In n1 l2 -> n1 <= a)
permutation_cons_ex_aux : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> forall l11 l12 : list A, l1 = l11 ++ a :: l12 -> exists l3 l4 : list A, l2 = l3 ++ a :: l4 /\ permutation (l11 ++ l12) (l3 ++ l4)
permutation_one_inv_aux : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> forall a : A, l1 = a :: nil -> l2 = a :: nil
in_ex_app : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), In a l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ a :: l2
number_of_nodes_inb_le : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A), inb t1 t2 -> number_of_nodes t1 <= number_of_nodes t2
inb_trans : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), inb t1 t2 -> inb t2 t3 -> inb t1 t3
